author: jshlee
body:
same as #18625.

 * MuonSeedOrcaPatternRecognition - GEM and ME0 segments are added like CSC Segments for the seeding
 * MuonDetLayerMeasurements changed to give GEMRecHits or GEMSegments depending on input layer (chamber or superChamber)
   * Changes in MuonDetLayerMeasurements led to slight mods to other files

link to talk with performance (page 6)
https://indico.cern.ch/event/614702/contributions/2514657/attachments/1430929/2197998/muonReco_20170321.pdf

@calabria @kpedro88
title: seeding with Gem and ME0 Segments
